mutants.original_line: """Calculate the sum, minimum, and maximum of a given list, excluding strings."""
mutants.code:
def calculate_sum_min_max(lst):
    """"""
    numbers = [element for element in lst if isinstance(element, int)]
    sum_numbers = sum(numbers)
    min_number = min(numbers) if numbers else None
    max_number = max(numbers) if numbers else None
    return (sum_numbers, min_number, max_number)
